title: Inception
stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Tom Hardy
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets is given a chance to have his past crimes erased.

title: The Dark Knight
stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
description: Batman battles the Joker, who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

title: Titanic
description: A love story between Jack and Rose unfolds aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: Avengers: Endgame
stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson
description: The Avengers reunite for a final stand against Thanos to restore balance to the universe.

title: Interstellar
stars: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
description: A group of astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A man wrongly convicted of murder finds hope and friendship in prison.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a kind-hearted man with a low IQ.

title: Jurassic Park
stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
description: A group of people try to survive on an island where dinosaurs have been brought back to life.

title: The Matrix
stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
description: A hacker discovers that reality is an illusion created by machines.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Pulp Fiction
stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
description: A nonlinear crime drama following multiple intertwining stories.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen
description: The final battle for Middle-earth as Frodo reaches Mount Doom.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: A group of soldiers embark on a mission to save a paratrooper behind enemy lines.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker deals with the consequences of his identity being revealed.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of a crime family transfers control to his reluctant son.
